name: BTown Web
tagline: BTown Web is your Shopify & WooCommerce Agency
description: BTown Web is a development agency that provides programming and marketing services to ecommerce companies. We help our clients with Platforms (Shopify & Shopify Plus, WooCommerce, ShipStation and many others), Services (Dev, Design, Marketing and Analytics) and we provide consulting and integration assistance for Channels (Amazon, eBay, Walmart, etc). In the context of those 3 areas BTown Web is able to provide support and best practice guidance to help our clients grow.
